note:
Kite society KAP Jasa was formed in 2017 as a kite aerial photography endeavour. Now it is a full-fledged kite non-profit NGO, the largest (and thus far the only) in Slovenia.

We make and fly kites, we participate at and organise kite festivals, we do kite workshops for kids and adults, and do all kinds of kite science.

KAP Jasa was recognised by Ministry of Culture of Slovenia as a NGO acting in public interest.
